wikipedia_page.main: Richard Hughes Jones (27 November 1879 – 24 November 1958) was a Welsh international fly-half who played club rugby for Swansea Rugby Club. He won 15 caps for Wales and played county rugby for Glamorgan.

response: *Dick Jones, senior vice president of OCP in the movie RoboCop
*Dick Jones (rugby union) (1879–1958), Welsh international rugby union footballer
